channel.title: Strange thing with my wildnerness sign
channel.description:
Hello-
I have an odd problem with the wilderness sign that usually indicates what level wilderness you're in. I'm using the EyreScape source and usually when you're in the wild there is no wilderness-level indicator, but for me it appears for a split second when you enter a new level. If anybody could tell me what I could do to keep the sign up for the entire time you're in the wild, it would be greatly appreciated! :D
-Thanks

item.title: Strange thing with my wildnerness sign
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

delete the thing at the top of your screen and it will work fine

Read full topic
item.source: Strange thing with my wildnerness sign

item.title: Strange thing with my wildnerness sign
item.dc:creator: @Randomhero Randomhero
item.description:
@Randomhero wrote:

Oh I didn’t know that. Like at the top of the screen it would say:

RandomHeroScape
Players Online: 5

I can’t have that at the top as well as my wild-level indicator at the lower - right corner?

Read full topic
